---
title: "visualizations"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
# plot a simple scatter plot
data(mtcars)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Scatter plot of MPG vs Weight",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon (MPG)")

```
